<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-title-link" data-attribute="harvards-campus" href="https://www.harvard.edu/campus/" rel="bookmark">
										Harvard's Campus											<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></a>
</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Get tickets to our next game, hours and locations for our libraries and museums, and information about your next career move. 				</span>
</div>
</div>

<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-title-link" data-attribute="in-focus" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/" rel="bookmark">
										In Focus											<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></a>
</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Explore a curated examination of Harvard's research, scholarly work, and community. Recent topics include:				</span>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-1"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67602" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="genetics" data-depth="1" data-id="67602" data-id-parent="61337" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-67602" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Genetics<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-67602" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-2" data-depth="2" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-67602">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-2">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-2">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67602" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-2" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-67602" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> In Focus		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										Genetics									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Within each cell, winding through chromosomes, waiting to be decoded from DNA, are the genes that make us who we are. Harvard researchers are working to understand how these tiny instructions exert such a large influence on our lives.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="decode-the-mysteries" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/genetics/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Decode the mysteries				</a>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-2 nav-primary__child-list--layout-content_cards"><li class="nav-primary__item-content_cards-wrapper"><strong class="nav-primary__item--content-card-title" id="content-card-title-67602">What's inside</strong><ol aria-labelledby="content-card-title-67602" class="nav-primary__list-content_cards-wrapper"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-content_cards"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="can-we-correct-the-genetic-mutations-that-cause-diseases" data-depth="2" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/04/rewriting-genetic-destiny-gene-base-editing/">
<figure class="nav-primary__item-image c-image" style="padding-top: 66.69921875%;">
<div aria-label="David Liu in his office" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-bgset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/032825_PrionProgress_041.jpeg?w=300 300w 200h,

</figure>
<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">
<span class="nav-primary__item-title-text">
		Can we correct the genetic mutations that cause diseases?	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-content_cards"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="why-are-you-that-tall" data-depth="2" href="https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/genetics-height">

<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">
<span class="nav-primary__item-title-text">
		Why are you that tall?	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
</ol></li></ol> </div>

<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67205" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="heart-health" data-depth="1" data-id="67205" data-id-parent="61337" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-67205" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Heart Health<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-67205" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-2" data-depth="2" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-67205">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-2">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-2">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67205" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-2" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-67205" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> In Focus		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										Heart Health									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Cardiovascular diseases continue to be the number one cause of death worldwide. Harvard experts are leading the way on advancements in prevention, treatment, risk assessment, and innovative breakthroughs.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="explore-heart-health-at-harvard" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/heart-health/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Explore heart health at Harvard				</a>
</div>
</div>

<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">

										History of Harvard									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Harvard is perhaps best-known because of its enduring history of innovation in education. But even die-hard Harvard buffs are not likely to know all of these Harvard firsts and historical snippets.				</span>

<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">

<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">

		Officers and Deans	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-standard_list"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="harvard-corporation" data-depth="2" href="https://www.harvard.edu/about/leadership-and-governance/harvard-corporation/">
<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">
<span class="nav-primary__item-title-text">
		Harvard Corporation	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-standard_list"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="board-of-overseers" data-depth="2" href="https://www.harvard.edu/about/leadership-and-governance/board-of-overseers/">
<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">
<span class="nav-primary__item-title-text">
		Board of Overseers	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
</ol> </div>
</li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1" data-attribute="university-professorships" data-depth="1" href="https://www.harvard.edu/about/university-professorships/"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">University Professorships<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></span></a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1" data-attribute="endowment" data-depth="1" href="https://www.harvard.edu/about/endowment/"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Endowment<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></span></a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1" data-attribute="belonging" data-depth="1" href="https://ccl.harvard.edu/"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Belonging<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></span></a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1" data-attribute="harvard-in-the-community" data-depth="1" href="https://www.harvard.edu/about/harvard-in-the-community/"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Harvard in the Community<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></span></a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1" data-attribute="harvard-in-the-world" data-depth="1" href="https://www.harvard.edu/about/harvard-in-the-world/"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Harvard in the World<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></span></a></li>
</ol></div>
</li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-0 nav-primary__item--has-children"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-1671" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-0 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="news" data-bgd-image-id="0-1671-0" data-depth="0" data-id="1671" data-id-parent="0" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-1671" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">News</span></button>

<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-1">

</header>
<main id="main-content">
<header>
<h1 class="screen-reader-text">
					Harvard University				</h1>
</header>
<div class="s-sink t-sink l-sink">
<section class="c-block b-hero t-theme--light no-caption no-cta no-featured-story an-no-animate">
<div class="b-hero__container l-container">
<div class="b-hero__media b-hero__media-overlay--soft">
<div class="b-hero__figure c-image--bg c-image">
<div aria-label="a strand of DNA" class="b-hero__img c-image__image lazyload" data-bgset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_312211604.jpg?w=2000 2000w 1192h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_312211604.jpg?w=1152 1152w 687h" data-expand="200" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/core-full.png');"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-hero__content">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-hero__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-center">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-hero__title b-hero__title--large c-content-block__title">
	Genetics</h2>
<p class="c-block__underline b-hero__underline c-content-block__underline">
	Within each cell, winding through chromosomes, waiting to be decoded from DNA, are the genes that make us who we are. Harvard researchers are working to understand how these tiny instructions exert such a large influence on our lives.</p>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
</div>
</header>
</div>
<div class="b-hero__bottom-line"></div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-list-with-image t-theme--light">
<div class="b-list-with-image__container l-container">
<div class="b-list-with-image__loop">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3><a href="https://pll.harvard.edu/course/data-analysis-life-sciences-7-case-studies-functional-genomics">Learn functional genomics</a></h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>In this <a href="https://pll.harvard.edu/course/data-analysis-life-sciences-7-case-studies-functional-genomics">free online Harvard course</a> you can learn how to analyze DNA and RNA using open source software.</p>
</div>
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="" class="c-image__image" decoding="async" src=""/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-left c-block--width-grid c-block--is-video content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="c-video__block">
<div class="c-video--lazy c-video c-video--trigger-bottom" data-embed-id="mrABY7rJAzw" data-embed-provider="YouTube" data-embed-title="Learn about David's lab" data-js="c-video">
<div class="c-video__wrapper">
<img alt="" class="c-video__thumbnail lazyload" data-src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/mrABY7rJAzw/maxresdefault.jpg" role="presentation" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/16x9.png"/>
<div class="c-video__trigger-action">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="c-video__trigger-icon icon-play"></span>
<span class="c-video__trigger-label" id="v-68f54b3a0371f-title">
					Learn about David's lab				</span>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-describedby="v-68f54b3a0371f-link" aria-labelledby="v-68f54b3a0371f-title" class="c-video__trigger" data-js="c-video-trigger" href="https://youtu.be/mrABY7rJAzw" id="v-68f54b3a0371f-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Click to Play Video</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h3 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Can we correct the genetic mutations that cause diseases?</h3>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Hundreds of millions of people worldwide suffer from genetic diseases, including cancer. To help them, Professor David Liu, with support from the NIH, DARPA, and other federal agencies, is correcting genetic mutations by modifying DNA.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Explore more about David's work" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/04/rewriting-genetic-destiny-gene-base-editing/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Explore more about Davids work			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-right c-block--width-grid content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="Geneticist Joel Hirschhorn measuring his height" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Joel-Hirschhorn-43.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Joel-Hirschhorn-43.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h,

</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Why are you that tall?</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Geneticist Joel Hirschhorns fascination with the heredity of height, which has a long history in early genetics research, has led to insights about the biology of growth and disease.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Explore the genetics of height" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/genetics-height">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Explore the genetics of height			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-left c-block--width-grid content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">

</figure>

</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	What happens when you share your genetic data?</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Harvard Law Schools I. Glenn Cohen explains the legal landscape surrounding genetic data, the reasons for more consumer protection laws, and the steps for consumers to protect their personal and genetic data.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Read more about the legal side of genetics" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/03/what-happens-to-your-genetic-data-if-23andme-collapses/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Read more about the legal side of genetics			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<h3 class="c-card__title" id="p-68f54b3a0555d-title">
<span>Feyisayo Eweje</span></h3>
<div class="t-sink s-sink c-card__description">
<p>At Harvards Wyss Institute, Feyisayo is working on a method to transport gene editors to the right cells in the body, so they can directly correct mutations.</p></div>
</div>

<span>Christina Warinner</span></h3>
<div class="t-sink s-sink c-card__description">
<p>As a professor of scientific archaeology, Christina uses ancient DNA in her pioneering work cracking the mysteries of early human diets and health.</p></div>

<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="A representation of a human genome which looks like lines of colors" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_426224980.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_426224980.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h,

</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<p class="c-block__leadin b-media-text__leadin c-content-block__leadin">
	Did you know?</p>
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Human genome projects</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p><a href="https://wyss.harvard.edu/team/core-faculty/george-church/">George Church</a>, professor of genetics at Harvard Medical School, developed the first direct genomic sequencing method, which resulted in the first genome sequence. Since then, he helped initiate the Human Genome Project in 1984 and the <a href="https://pgp.med.harvard.edu/about">Personal Genome Project</a> in 2005.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Learn more about how genomes work" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://www.labxchange.org/library/clusters/lx-cluster:lxc-genetics">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Learn more about how genomes work			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-news">
<div class="b-news__container l-container">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-news__header c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-news__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Getting to the origin of diseases</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Learn how Harvard researchers are developing a genome editing platform to treat genetic diseases" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://wyss.harvard.edu/news/humans-of-the-wyss-erik-aznauryan-on-treatment-of-genetic-diseases/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Learn how Harvard researchers are developing a genome editing platform to treat genetic diseases			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</header>
<div class="b-news__wrap">
<div class="b-news__left">
<div class="b-news__first">
<figure class="b-news__first-img main-image c-image">
<img alt="A doctor talking to a patient" class="c-image__image" decoding="async" sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_671817987.jpg?w=736&amp;h=491&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_671817987.jpg?w=736&amp;h=491&amp;crop=1 736w 491h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_671817987.jpg?w=736&amp;h=491&amp;crop=1 736w 491h"/>
</figure>
<h3 class="h3 b-news__first-title" id="p-68f54b3a076db-title">
<span>Knowing your genetic predisposition to diseases</span>
</h3>
<p class="p b-news__first-excerpt">Polygenic risk score tests comb through a persons DNA to calculate genetic predisposition to things like heart disease, type 2 diabetes, Alzheimers disease, and common cancers. Should we all know our genetic disease risks? How do we make sense of what the scores tell us and dont tell us?</p>
<a aria-describedby="p-68f54b3a076db-link" aria-labelledby="p-68f54b3a076db-title" class="b-news__first-cta is-target-link" data-js="target-link" href="https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/what-polygenic-risk-score-can-and-cant-tell-you" id="p-68f54b3a076db-link">
			Knowing your genetic predisposition to diseases	</a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-news__right">
<div class="b-news__side-wrap">
<div class="b-news__side-content">
<ul class="b-news__side-category">
<li>
<span class="b-news__category__item">
	Obesity</span>
</li>
</ul>

</ul>
<h3 class="b-news__side-title" id="p-68f54b3a09141-title">
<span>Exploring how the Mediterranean diet can offset genetic risks for dementia</span>
</h3>
</div>
<figure class="b-news__side-img side-img c-image">
<img alt="A table full of healthy foods" class="c-image__image" decoding="async" sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/diet-dementia-1920.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/diet-dementia-1920.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/diet-dementia-1920.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h"/>
</figure>
<a aria-describedby="p-68f54b3a09141-link" aria-labelledby="p-68f54b3a09141-title" class="b-news__side-cta is-target-link" data-js="target-link" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/08/mediterranean-diet-offsets-genetic-risk-for-dementia-study-finds/" id="p-68f54b3a09141-link">
			Exploring how the Mediterranean diet can offset genetic risks for dementia	</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-left c-block--width-grid t-theme--light content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="An illustration showing how CRISPR technology can remove and add genes to DNA" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1 768w 576h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=1536&amp;h=1152&amp;crop=1 1536w 1152h" decoding="async" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png"/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<p class="c-block__leadin b-media-text__leadin c-content-block__leadin">
	Did you know?</p>
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	CRISPR</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p><a href="https://www.broadinstitute.org/what-broad/areas-focus/project-spotlight/crispr-timeline">First discovered as a defense system</a> protecting bacteria against viruses, this genome-editing tool has been studied by scientists for decades because of its enormous potential.</p>
<p>In 2025, a team at Harvard Medical School helped create <a href="https://hms.harvard.edu/news/creating-worlds-first-crispr-medicine-sickle-cell-disease">the worlds first approved medicine based on CRISPR</a>/Cas9 gene-editing technology, and other <a href="https://wyss.harvard.edu/news/crisprs-impact-today/">CRISPR-based treatments developed at Harvard</a> are soon to follow.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Learn more about CRISPR" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://www.labxchange.org/library/items/lb:LabXchange:525bf68a:lx_simulation:1">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Learn more about CRISPR			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-header">
<div class="l-container b-header__container">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-header__header c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-header__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	History is in our DNA</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
</div>
</header>
<hr class="b-header__border"/>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block--remove-padding c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-left c-block--width-grid content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="David Reich talking at a podium" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1 768w 576h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=1434&amp;h=956&amp;crop=1 1434w 956h" decoding="async" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png"/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Debunking pure bloodlines and ancestral homelands</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Harvard geneticist <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/09/his-labs-ancient-dna-studies-are-rewriting-human-history/">David Reich</a> explains that everyones genetic background shows a mix from different waves of migration that washed over the globe. The big perspective change from ancient DNA study is that people living today are almost never the descendants of the people in the same place thousands of years before.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Read more about this research" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/09/claims-of-pure-bloodlines-ancestral-homelands-dna-science-says-no/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Read more about this research			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block--remove-top-padding c-block b-list-with-image">
<div class="b-list-with-image__container l-container">
<div class="b-list-with-image__loop">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3>Decoding the origins of languages</h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>Experts are using ancient DNA to explore the origins of the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/07/ancient-dna-solves-mystery-of-hungarian-finnish-language-familys-origins/">Uralic family of languages, which include Hungarian, Finnish, and Estonian</a>, along with the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/02/landmark-studies-track-source-of-indo-european-languages-spoken-by-40-of-world/">Indo-European family of 400-plus languages</a>, spoken today by more than 40% of the worlds population.</p>
</div>
<figure class="b-list-with-image__item__figure c-image">
<div aria-label="&lt;h3&gt;Decoding the origins of languages&lt;/h3&gt;
" class="c-image__image" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Uralic-Kim-Kazakhstan.jpg?w=375');"></div>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3>Analyzing the evolution of birds</h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>Researchers are exploring the genetics behind <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2019/05/harvard-study-explores-genetics-behind-evolution-of-flightless-birds/">how flightless birds developed</a> and how a major DNA flip helped the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/02/what-prompts-genetic-adaptation-ask-a-finch/">house finch become resistant to certain diseases</a>.</p>
</div>
<figure class="b-list-with-image__item__figure c-image">
<div aria-label="&lt;h3&gt;Analyzing the evolution of birds&lt;/h3&gt;
" class="c-image__image" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/BohaoFang.jpg?w=375');"></div>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3>Uncovering ancient cultures</h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>Investigators are using DNA and genetic variations to get a more complete view of life in ancient cultures of <a href="https://hms.harvard.edu/news/ancient-dna-challenges-stories-told-about-pompeii-victims">Pompeii</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2024/06/history-of-chichen-itza-written-in-dna/">Chichn Itz</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2021/12/harvard-led-research-on-ancient-britain-spans-language-ancestry-kinship-milk/">Britain</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2020/12/ancient-dna-shines-light-on-caribbean-history-prehistory/">the Caribbean</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2022/07/research-on-genomic-history-of-remote-pacific-islands-yields-surprising-findings/">Pacific islands</a>, and the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2023/04/dna-shows-poorly-understood-empire-was-multiethnic-with-strong-female-leadership/">Xiongnu people</a>.</p>
</div>
<figure class="b-list-with-image__item__figure c-image">
<div aria-label="&lt;h3&gt;Uncovering ancient cultures&lt;/h3&gt;
" class="c-image__image" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/850-resize.jpg?w=375');"></div>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-link-list has-image">
<div class="b-link-list__figure c-image--bg c-image">
<div aria-label="An illustration of chromosomes" class="b-link-list__img c-image__image lazyload" data-bgset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_408171576.jpg?w=2000 2000w 1125h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_408171576.jpg?w=1152 1152w 648h" data-expand="200" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" role="img" style="background-image:url('');"></div>
</div>
<div class="l-container b-link-list__container">
<div class="b-link-list__left-col">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-link-list__header c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<p class="c-block__leadin b-media-text__leadin c-content-block__leadin">
	You may also like</p>

<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-0 nav-primary__item--has-children"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-61337" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-0 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="in-focus" data-depth="0" data-id="61337" data-id-parent="0" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-61337" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">In Focus</span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-61337" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-1" data-depth="1" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-61337">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-1">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-1">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-61337" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-1" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-61337" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> In Focus		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-title-link" data-attribute="in-focus" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/" rel="bookmark">
										In Focus											<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></a>
</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Explore a curated examination of Harvard's research, scholarly work, and community. Recent topics include:				</span>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-1"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67602" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="genetics" data-depth="1" data-id="67602" data-id-parent="61337" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-67602" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Genetics<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-67602" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-2" data-depth="2" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-67602">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-2">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-2">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67602" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-2" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-67602" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> In Focus		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										Genetics									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Within each cell, winding through chromosomes, waiting to be decoded from DNA, are the genes that make us who we are. Harvard researchers are working to understand how these tiny instructions exert such a large influence on our lives.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="decode-the-mysteries" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/genetics/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Decode the mysteries				</a>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-2 nav-primary__child-list--layout-content_cards"><li class="nav-primary__item-content_cards-wrapper"><strong class="nav-primary__item--content-card-title" id="content-card-title-67602">What's inside</strong><ol aria-labelledby="content-card-title-67602" class="nav-primary__list-content_cards-wrapper"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-content_cards"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="can-we-correct-the-genetic-mutations-that-cause-diseases" data-depth="2" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/04/rewriting-genetic-destiny-gene-base-editing/">
<figure class="nav-primary__item-image c-image" style="padding-top: 66.69921875%;">
<div aria-label="David Liu in his office" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-bgset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/032825_PrionProgress_041.jpeg?w=300 300w 200h,

</figure>
<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">
<span class="nav-primary__item-title-text">
		Can we correct the genetic mutations that cause diseases?	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-content_cards"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="why-are-you-that-tall" data-depth="2" href="https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/genetics-height">

<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67205" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="heart-health" data-depth="1" data-id="67205" data-id-parent="61337" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-67205" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Heart Health<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>

<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67205" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-2" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-67205" title="Return to main menu">

<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										Heart Health									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Cardiovascular diseases continue to be the number one cause of death worldwide. Harvard experts are leading the way on advancements in prevention, treatment, risk assessment, and innovative breakthroughs.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="explore-heart-health-at-harvard" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/heart-health/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Explore heart health at Harvard				</a>
</div>
</div>

<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-0 nav-primary__item--has-children"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-1671" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-0 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="news" data-bgd-image-id="0-1671-0" data-depth="0" data-id="1671" data-id-parent="0" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-1671" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">News</span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-1671" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-1" data-depth="1" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-1671">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-1">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-1">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-1671" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-1" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-1671" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> News		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-title-link" data-attribute="the-harvard-gazette" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/" rel="bookmark">
										The Harvard Gazette											<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></a>
</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Official news from Harvard University about science, medicine, art, campus life, University issues, and broader national and global concerns.				</span>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-1"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-5402" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="trending-news-stories" data-bgd-image-id="1671-5402-1" data-depth="1" data-id="5402" data-id-parent="1671" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-5402" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Trending News Stories<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>

</header>
<main id="main-content">
<header>
<h1 class="screen-reader-text">
					Harvard University				</h1>
</header>
<div class="s-sink t-sink l-sink">
<section class="c-block b-hero t-theme--light no-caption no-cta no-featured-story an-no-animate">
<div class="b-hero__container l-container">
<div class="b-hero__media b-hero__media-overlay--soft">
<div class="b-hero__figure c-image--bg c-image">
<div aria-label="a strand of DNA" class="b-hero__img c-image__image lazyload" data-bgset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_312211604.jpg?w=2000 2000w 1192h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_312211604.jpg?w=1152 1152w 687h" data-expand="200" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/core-full.png');"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-hero__content">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-hero__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-center">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-hero__title b-hero__title--large c-content-block__title">
	Genetics</h2>
<p class="c-block__underline b-hero__underline c-content-block__underline">
	Within each cell, winding through chromosomes, waiting to be decoded from DNA, are the genes that make us who we are. Harvard researchers are working to understand how these tiny instructions exert such a large influence on our lives.</p>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
</div>
</header>
</div>
<div class="b-hero__bottom-line"></div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-list-with-image t-theme--light">
<div class="b-list-with-image__container l-container">
<div class="b-list-with-image__loop">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3><a href="https://pll.harvard.edu/course/data-analysis-life-sciences-7-case-studies-functional-genomics">Learn functional genomics</a></h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>In this <a href="https://pll.harvard.edu/course/data-analysis-life-sciences-7-case-studies-functional-genomics">free online Harvard course</a> you can learn how to analyze DNA and RNA using open source software.</p>
</div>
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="" class="c-image__image" decoding="async" src=""/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-left c-block--width-grid c-block--is-video content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="c-video__block">
<div class="c-video--lazy c-video c-video--trigger-bottom" data-embed-id="mrABY7rJAzw" data-embed-provider="YouTube" data-embed-title="Learn about David's lab" data-js="c-video">
<div class="c-video__wrapper">
<img alt="" class="c-video__thumbnail lazyload" data-src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/mrABY7rJAzw/maxresdefault.jpg" role="presentation" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/16x9.png"/>
<div class="c-video__trigger-action">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="c-video__trigger-icon icon-play"></span>
<span class="c-video__trigger-label" id="v-68f54b3a0371f-title">
					Learn about David's lab				</span>
</div>
</div>
<a aria-describedby="v-68f54b3a0371f-link" aria-labelledby="v-68f54b3a0371f-title" class="c-video__trigger" data-js="c-video-trigger" href="https://youtu.be/mrABY7rJAzw" id="v-68f54b3a0371f-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Click to Play Video</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h3 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Can we correct the genetic mutations that cause diseases?</h3>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Hundreds of millions of people worldwide suffer from genetic diseases, including cancer. To help them, Professor David Liu, with support from the NIH, DARPA, and other federal agencies, is correcting genetic mutations by modifying DNA.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Explore more about David's work" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/04/rewriting-genetic-destiny-gene-base-editing/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Explore more about Davids work			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-right c-block--width-grid content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="Geneticist Joel Hirschhorn measuring his height" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Joel-Hirschhorn-43.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Joel-Hirschhorn-43.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Joel-Hirschhorn-43.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1 768w 576h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Joel-Hirschhorn-43.jpg?w=1536&amp;h=1024&amp;crop=1 1536w 1024h" decoding="async" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png"/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Why are you that tall?</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Geneticist Joel Hirschhorns fascination with the heredity of height, which has a long history in early genetics research, has led to insights about the biology of growth and disease.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Explore the genetics of height" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/genetics-height">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Explore the genetics of height			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-left c-block--width-grid content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="A box from 23andme" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/23andme-genetic-data.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/23andme-genetic-data.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/23andme-genetic-data.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1 768w 576h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/23andme-genetic-data.jpg?w=1536&amp;h=1152&amp;crop=1 1536w 1152h" decoding="async" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png"/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	What happens when you share your genetic data?</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Harvard Law Schools I. Glenn Cohen explains the legal landscape surrounding genetic data, the reasons for more consumer protection laws, and the steps for consumers to protect their personal and genetic data.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Read more about the legal side of genetics" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/03/what-happens-to-your-genetic-data-if-23andme-collapses/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Read more about the legal side of genetics			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<h2 class="c-block__title b-header__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Passing down knowledge</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">

<h3 class="c-card__title" id="p-68f54b3a0555d-title">
<span>Feyisayo Eweje</span></h3>
<div class="t-sink s-sink c-card__description">
<p>At Harvards Wyss Institute, Feyisayo is working on a method to transport gene editors to the right cells in the body, so they can directly correct mutations.</p></div>
</div>

<span>Christina Warinner</span></h3>
<div class="t-sink s-sink c-card__description">
<p>As a professor of scientific archaeology, Christina uses ancient DNA in her pioneering work cracking the mysteries of early human diets and health.</p></div>

<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="A representation of a human genome which looks like lines of colors" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_426224980.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_426224980.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h,

</figure>
</div>

<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<p class="c-block__leadin b-media-text__leadin c-content-block__leadin">
	Did you know?</p>
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Human genome projects</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p><a href="https://wyss.harvard.edu/team/core-faculty/george-church/">George Church</a>, professor of genetics at Harvard Medical School, developed the first direct genomic sequencing method, which resulted in the first genome sequence. Since then, he helped initiate the Human Genome Project in 1984 and the <a href="https://pgp.med.harvard.edu/about">Personal Genome Project</a> in 2005.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Learn more about how genomes work" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://www.labxchange.org/library/clusters/lx-cluster:lxc-genetics">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Learn more about how genomes work			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-news">
<div class="b-news__container l-container">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-news__header c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-news__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Getting to the origin of diseases</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Learn how Harvard researchers are developing a genome editing platform to treat genetic diseases" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://wyss.harvard.edu/news/humans-of-the-wyss-erik-aznauryan-on-treatment-of-genetic-diseases/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Learn how Harvard researchers are developing a genome editing platform to treat genetic diseases			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</header>
<div class="b-news__wrap">
<div class="b-news__left">
<div class="b-news__first">
<figure class="b-news__first-img main-image c-image">
<img alt="A doctor talking to a patient" class="c-image__image" decoding="async" sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_671817987.jpg?w=736&amp;h=491&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_671817987.jpg?w=736&amp;h=491&amp;crop=1 736w 491h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_671817987.jpg?w=736&amp;h=491&amp;crop=1 736w 491h"/>
</figure>
<h3 class="h3 b-news__first-title" id="p-68f54b3a076db-title">
<span>Knowing your genetic predisposition to diseases</span>
</h3>
<p class="p b-news__first-excerpt">Polygenic risk score tests comb through a persons DNA to calculate genetic predisposition to things like heart disease, type 2 diabetes, Alzheimers disease, and common cancers. Should we all know our genetic disease risks? How do we make sense of what the scores tell us and dont tell us?</p>
<a aria-describedby="p-68f54b3a076db-link" aria-labelledby="p-68f54b3a076db-title" class="b-news__first-cta is-target-link" data-js="target-link" href="https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/what-polygenic-risk-score-can-and-cant-tell-you" id="p-68f54b3a076db-link">
			Knowing your genetic predisposition to diseases	</a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-news__right">
<div class="b-news__side-wrap">
<div class="b-news__side-content">
<ul class="b-news__side-category">
<li>
<span class="b-news__category__item">
	Obesity</span>
</li>
</ul>

<span>Exploring the genetic causes of obesity</span>
</h3>

<img alt="An illustration showing how CRISPR technology can remove and add genes to DNA" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1 768w 576h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_713334710.jpg?w=1536&amp;h=1152&amp;crop=1 1536w 1152h" decoding="async" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png"/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<p class="c-block__leadin b-media-text__leadin c-content-block__leadin">
	Did you know?</p>
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	CRISPR</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p><a href="https://www.broadinstitute.org/what-broad/areas-focus/project-spotlight/crispr-timeline">First discovered as a defense system</a> protecting bacteria against viruses, this genome-editing tool has been studied by scientists for decades because of its enormous potential.</p>
<p>In 2025, a team at Harvard Medical School helped create <a href="https://hms.harvard.edu/news/creating-worlds-first-crispr-medicine-sickle-cell-disease">the worlds first approved medicine based on CRISPR</a>/Cas9 gene-editing technology, and other <a href="https://wyss.harvard.edu/news/crisprs-impact-today/">CRISPR-based treatments developed at Harvard</a> are soon to follow.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Learn more about CRISPR" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://www.labxchange.org/library/items/lb:LabXchange:525bf68a:lx_simulation:1">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Learn more about CRISPR			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-header">
<div class="l-container b-header__container">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-header__header c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-header__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	History is in our DNA</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
</div>
</header>
<hr class="b-header__border"/>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block--remove-padding c-block b-media-text c-block--layout-left c-block--width-grid content-vertical">
<div class="b-media-text__container l-container">
<div class="b-media-text__media">
<div class="b-media-text__img-wrap">
<figure class="c-image">
<img alt="David Reich talking at a podium" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-expand="200" data-parent-fit="width" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" data-src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1" data-srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=375&amp;h=281&amp;crop=1 375w 281h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=768&amp;h=576&amp;crop=1 768w 576h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/091525_Humans_0023.jpeg?w=1434&amp;h=956&amp;crop=1 1434w 956h" decoding="async" src="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png" srcset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/themes/core/assets/img/theme/shims/four-three.png"/>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-media-text__content">
<div class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-media-text__content-container c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<h2 class="c-block__title b-media-text__title h3 c-content-block__title">
	Debunking pure bloodlines and ancestral homelands</h2>
<div class="c-content-block__content-wrap">
<div class="c-block__description b-media-text__text t-sink s-sink c-content-block__content">
<p>Harvard geneticist <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/09/his-labs-ancient-dna-studies-are-rewriting-human-history/">David Reich</a> explains that everyones genetic background shows a mix from different waves of migration that washed over the globe. The big perspective change from ancient DNA study is that people living today are almost never the descendants of the people in the same place thousands of years before.</p>
</div>
<p class="c-content-block__cta">
<a aria-label="Read more about this research" class="c-block__cta-link a-btn a-btn-secondary a-btn--arrow-right c-content-block__cta-link" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/09/claims-of-pure-bloodlines-ancestral-homelands-dna-science-says-no/">
<span class="a-btn__text">
			Read more about this research			</span>
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block--remove-top-padding c-block b-list-with-image">
<div class="b-list-with-image__container l-container">
<div class="b-list-with-image__loop">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3>Decoding the origins of languages</h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>Experts are using ancient DNA to explore the origins of the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/07/ancient-dna-solves-mystery-of-hungarian-finnish-language-familys-origins/">Uralic family of languages, which include Hungarian, Finnish, and Estonian</a>, along with the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/02/landmark-studies-track-source-of-indo-european-languages-spoken-by-40-of-world/">Indo-European family of 400-plus languages</a>, spoken today by more than 40% of the worlds population.</p>
</div>
<figure class="b-list-with-image__item__figure c-image">
<div aria-label="&lt;h3&gt;Decoding the origins of languages&lt;/h3&gt;
" class="c-image__image" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Uralic-Kim-Kazakhstan.jpg?w=375');"></div>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3>Analyzing the evolution of birds</h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>Researchers are exploring the genetics behind <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2019/05/harvard-study-explores-genetics-behind-evolution-of-flightless-birds/">how flightless birds developed</a> and how a major DNA flip helped the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/02/what-prompts-genetic-adaptation-ask-a-finch/">house finch become resistant to certain diseases</a>.</p>
</div>
<figure class="b-list-with-image__item__figure c-image">
<div aria-label="&lt;h3&gt;Analyzing the evolution of birds&lt;/h3&gt;
" class="c-image__image" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/BohaoFang.jpg?w=375');"></div>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item">
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__title t-sink s-sink">
<h3>Uncovering ancient cultures</h3>
</div>
<div class="b-list-with-image__item__description t-sink s-sink">
<p>Investigators are using DNA and genetic variations to get a more complete view of life in ancient cultures of <a href="https://hms.harvard.edu/news/ancient-dna-challenges-stories-told-about-pompeii-victims">Pompeii</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2024/06/history-of-chichen-itza-written-in-dna/">Chichn Itz</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2021/12/harvard-led-research-on-ancient-britain-spans-language-ancestry-kinship-milk/">Britain</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2020/12/ancient-dna-shines-light-on-caribbean-history-prehistory/">the Caribbean</a>, <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2022/07/research-on-genomic-history-of-remote-pacific-islands-yields-surprising-findings/">Pacific islands</a>, and the <a href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2023/04/dna-shows-poorly-understood-empire-was-multiethnic-with-strong-female-leadership/">Xiongnu people</a>.</p>
</div>
<figure class="b-list-with-image__item__figure c-image">
<div aria-label="&lt;h3&gt;Uncovering ancient cultures&lt;/h3&gt;
" class="c-image__image" role="img" style="background-image:url('https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/850-resize.jpg?w=375');"></div>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="c-block b-link-list has-image">
<div class="b-link-list__figure c-image--bg c-image">
<div aria-label="An illustration of chromosomes" class="b-link-list__img c-image__image lazyload" data-bgset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_408171576.jpg?w=2000 2000w 1125h, 
https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/AdobeStock_408171576.jpg?w=1152 1152w 648h" data-expand="200" data-sizes="(min-width: 1260px) 1260px, 100vw" role="img" style="background-image:url('');"></div>
</div>
<div class="l-container b-link-list__container">
<div class="b-link-list__left-col">
<header class="c-block__content-block c-block__header b-link-list__header c-content-block c-content-block--layout-left">
<p class="c-block__leadin b-media-text__leadin c-content-block__leadin">
	You may also like</p>

<div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Site Navigation" class="site-nav" data-js="site-nav" id="site-nav" role="dialog">
<div class="site-nav__outer">
<div class="site-nav__inner">
<nav aria-label="Primary" class="nav-primary" data-js="site-nav-container">
<div class="nav-primary__wrapper">
<div class="nav-primary__col-0" data-js="site-nav-col-one">
<ol class="nav-primary__list">
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-0 nav-primary__item--has-children"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-6683" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-0 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="academics" data-depth="0" data-id="6683" data-id-parent="0" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-6683" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Academics</span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-6683" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-1" data-depth="1" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-6683">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-1">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-1">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-6683" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-1" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-6683" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> Academics		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-title-link" data-attribute="academics" href="https://www.harvard.edu/academics/" rel="bookmark">
										Academics											<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></a>
</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Learning at Harvard can happen for every type of learner, at any phase of life.				</span>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-1"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-6682" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="degree-programs" data-bgd-image-id="6683-6682-1" data-depth="1" data-id="6682" data-id-parent="6683" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-6682" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Degree programs<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-6682" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-2" data-depth="2" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-6682">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-2">

<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-0 nav-primary__item--has-children"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-61337" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-0 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="in-focus" data-depth="0" data-id="61337" data-id-parent="0" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-61337" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">In Focus</span></button>

<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-1">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-1">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-61337" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-1" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-61337" title="Return to main menu">

<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-title-link" data-attribute="in-focus" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/" rel="bookmark">
										In Focus											<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span></a>
</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Explore a curated examination of Harvard's research, scholarly work, and community. Recent topics include:				</span>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-1"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67602" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="genetics" data-depth="1" data-id="67602" data-id-parent="61337" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-67602" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Genetics<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-67602" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-2" data-depth="2" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-67602">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-2">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-2">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67602" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-2" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-67602" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> In Focus		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										Genetics									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Within each cell, winding through chromosomes, waiting to be decoded from DNA, are the genes that make us who we are. Harvard researchers are working to understand how these tiny instructions exert such a large influence on our lives.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="decode-the-mysteries" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/genetics/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Decode the mysteries				</a>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-2 nav-primary__child-list--layout-content_cards"><li class="nav-primary__item-content_cards-wrapper"><strong class="nav-primary__item--content-card-title" id="content-card-title-67602">What's inside</strong><ol aria-labelledby="content-card-title-67602" class="nav-primary__list-content_cards-wrapper"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-content_cards"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="can-we-correct-the-genetic-mutations-that-cause-diseases" data-depth="2" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/04/rewriting-genetic-destiny-gene-base-editing/">

<div aria-label="David Liu in his office" class="c-image__image lazyload" data-bgset="https://www.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/032825_PrionProgress_041.jpeg?w=300 300w 200h,

</figure>
<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">
<span class="nav-primary__item-title-text">
		Can we correct the genetic mutations that cause diseases?	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-content_cards"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="why-are-you-that-tall" data-depth="2" href="https://magazine.hms.harvard.edu/articles/genetics-height">

</figure>
<strong class="nav-primary__item-title">
<span class="nav-primary__item-title-text">
		Why are you that tall?	</span>
</strong>
</a></li>
</ol></li></ol> </div>
</li>
<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67205" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="heart-health" data-depth="1" data-id="67205" data-id-parent="61337" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-67205" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Heart Health<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-67205" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-2" data-depth="2" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-67205">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-2">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-2">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-67205" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-2" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-67205" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> In Focus		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										Heart Health									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Cardiovascular diseases continue to be the number one cause of death worldwide. Harvard experts are leading the way on advancements in prevention, treatment, risk assessment, and innovative breakthroughs.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="explore-heart-health-at-harvard" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/heart-health/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Explore heart health at Harvard				</a>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="nav-primary__child-list nav-primary__child-list--depth-2 nav-primary__child-list--layout-content_cards"><li class="nav-primary__item-content_cards-wrapper"><strong class="nav-primary__item--content-card-title" id="content-card-title-67205">What's inside</strong><ol aria-labelledby="content-card-title-67205" class="nav-primary__list-content_cards-wrapper"> <li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-2 nav-primary__item--layout-content_cards"><a class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-2" data-attribute="new-study-suggests-that-weight-loss-drugs-may-benefit-heart-patients" data-depth="2" href="https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2025/09/weight-loss-drugs-protect-heart-patients-study-suggests/">

</strong>

<li class="nav-primary__item nav-primary__item--depth-1 nav-primary__item--has-children nav-primary__item--sub-mob-vis-true"><button aria-controls="menu-item-child-66725" aria-expanded="false" class="nav-primary__action nav-primary__action--depth-1 nav-primary__action--has-children" data-attribute="welcome-to-harvard" data-depth="1" data-id="66725" data-id-parent="61337" data-js="trigger-child-menu" id="menu-item-66725" title="Toggle Sub-Menu"><span class="nav-primary__action-text">Welcome to Harvard<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-chevron-right"></span></span></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="menu-item-66725" class="nav-primary__child nav-primary__child--depth-2" data-depth="2" data-js="child-menu" id="menu-item-child-66725">
<div class="nav-primary__subsec nav-primary__subsec--top nav-primary__subsec--has-content nav-primary__subsec--depth-2">
<div class="nav-primary__back nav-primary__back--depth-2">
<button aria-controls="menu-item-child-66725" aria-expanded="true" aria-label="Return to main menu" class="nav-primary__back-action nav-primary__back-action--depth-2" data-js="trigger-menu-return" id="menu-item-back-66725" title="Return to main menu">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="nav-primary__back-action-icon icon icon-chevron-left"></span> In Focus		</button>
</div>
<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										Welcome to Harvard									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					On our campus, world-class faculty and talented students come together to create a better world through groundbreaking research, cutting-edge innovations, and transformative scholarly work.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="join-us" href="https://www.harvard.edu/in-focus/welcome-to-harvard/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Join us				</a>
</div>
</div>

<div class="nav-primary__subsec-header">
<strong class="nav-primary__subsec-title">
										History of Harvard									</strong>
<span class="nav-primary__subsec-description">
					Harvard is perhaps best-known because of its enduring history of innovation in education. But even die-hard Harvard buffs are not likely to know all of these Harvard firsts and historical snippets.				</span>
<a class="nav-primary__subsec-cta" data-attribute="learn-more-about-harvards-history" href="https://www.harvard.edu/about/history/" rel="bookmark">
<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right"></span>Learn more about Harvard's history				</a>
</div>
</div>
